en:
Join the hundreds of researchers from around
           the world who are part of the Open Specy community by
           analyzing, sharing, processing, and identifying
           their Raman and IR spectra. These services are free and open source thanks to our partners:
xh:
Joyina amakhulu abaphandi abavela ngeenxa zonke
           ihlabathi abayinxalenye yoluntu Open Specy ngu
           ukuhlalutya, ukwabelana, ukusetyenzwa, kunye nokuchonga
           iRaman yabo kunye ne-IR spectra. Ezi nkonzo zisimahla kwaye zivuleleke ngomthombo enkosi kumaqabane ethu:

en:
In Brief: To use the tool upload a csv, asp, jdx, spc, or spa file to the upload file tab.
                                  If csv, one column should be named 'wavenumber' (in units of 1/cm) and another named 'intensity'.
                                  You can smooth your data using an SG filter, baseline correct your data using the polynomial order of iModPolyFit, and restrict the wavelength range for the match.
                                  The result will be compared to an internal Raman or FTIR spectra library. The strongest 1000 matches along with your
                                  uploaded or processed data will be presented in an interactive plot and table. For more details click the button below
                                  or watch the detailed instructional video.
xh:
Ngokufutshane: Ukusebenzisa isixhobo layisha i-csv, asp, jdx, spc, okanye ifayile ye-spa kwifayile yokulayisha ithebhu.
                                  Ukuba i-csv, enye ikholamu kufuneka inikwe igama 'inani lamaza' (kwiiyunithi ze-1/cm) kunye nenye ebizwa ngokuba 'nobunzima'.
                                  Ungayigudisa idatha yakho usebenzisa isihluzi se-SG, isiseko silungise idatha yakho usebenzisa i-polynomial order ye-iModPolyFit, kwaye uthintele uluhlu lwamaza omdlalo.
                                  Isiphumo siya kuthelekiswa neRaman yangaphakathi okanye ithala leencwadi lemifanekiso ye-FTIR. Eyona midlalo inamandla ye-1000 kunye neyakho
                                  idatha elayishiweyo okanye esetyenzisiweyo iya kuboniswa kwisakhiwo esisebenzisanayo kunye netafile. Ngeenkcukacha ezithe vetshe cofa iqhosha elingezantsi
                                  okanye ubukele ividiyo eneenkcukacha zomyalelo.

en:
Reference spectra was sourced from open access resources
           online, peer reviewed publications, and corporate donations. In the future
           spectra that is uploaded to the tool will be incorporated to the reference
           library to make it even better.
xh:
I-spectra yereferensi yafunyanwa kwimithombo yofikelelo oluvulelekileyo
           kwi-intanethi, iimpapasho eziphononongwe ngoontanga, kunye neminikelo yenkampani. Kwilixa elizayo
           i-spectra efakwe kwisixhobo iya kufakwa kwireferensi
           ilayibrari ukwenza kube ngcono.

en:
To share spectra upload a file to the upload file tab. If you selected Share a copy of your spectra will be sent to the Community
           Data Warehouse on Open Science Framework. To add additional metadata, 
           fill in the avaliable metadata fields and click -Share Data-. The 
           spectra file that you uploaded along with your responses will be copied 
           to the a -With Metadata- subfolder at the link below. All shared data holds 
           a Creative Commons Attribution License 4.0.
xh:
Ukwabelana nge-spectra layisha ifayile kwifayile yokulayisha ithebhu. Ukuba ukhethe Yabelana ngekopi yembonakalo yakho iya kuthunyelwa kuluntu
           Uvimba weDatha kwiSakhelo seNzululwazi eVulekileyo. Ukongeza imethadatha eyongezelelweyo,
           gcwalisa imihlaba yemethadatha ekhoyo kwaye ucofe -Yabelana ngeDatha-. I
           Ifayile ye-spectra oyilayishile kunye neempendulo zakho ziya kukotshwa
           kwi -NgeMetadata- isiqulathi seefayili esisezantsi kwikhonkco elingezantsi. Yonke idatha ekwabelwana ngayo ibambe
           ilayisensi yeCreative Commons Attribution 4.0.

en:
All parameters in this tool are tested to validate that 
           the tool is functioning as best as possible and determine the best default 
           parameters to use. Our current validation proceedure includes correcting 
           duplicated entries in the reference libraries, checking for spectra in 
           metadata that isn't in the spectral library, and ensuring the the default 
           parameters provide over 80% accuracy in the first match.
xh:
Zonke iiparamitha kwesi sixhobo zivavanywa ukuqinisekisa oko
           isixhobo sisebenza ngokugqibeleleyo kangangoko sinakho kwaye sigqibe okona kungagqibekanga
           iiparamitha eziza kusetyenziswa. Inkqubo yethu yangoku yokuqinisekisa ibandakanya ukulungisa
           amangenelo aphindwayo kwiilayibrari zezalathisi, ejonga i-spectra in
           imetadata engekhoyo kwilayibrari yokubonwa, kunye nokuqinisekisa ukungagqibeki
           iparameters zinika ngaphezulu kwe80% ukuchaneka kumdlalo wokuqala.

en: Updates, Feature Requests, and Bug Reports
xh: Uhlaziyo, iZicelo zoMcimbi, kunye neeNgxelo zeBug

en: We keep track of all updates using version control on our code. Features can be requested and bug reported on GitHub.
xh: Sigcina umkhondo walo lonke uhlaziyo sisebenzisa ulawulo lwenguqulelo kwikhowudi yethu. Iimpawu zinokucelwa kwaye i-bug ixelwe kwi-GitHub.

en: Follow us on Twitter @OpenSpecy. E-mail wincowger@gmail.com to be added to the mailing list.
xh: Silandele kuTwitter @OpenSpecy. I-imeyile i-wincowger@gmail.com mayifakwe kuluhlu lokuposa.

en: Free FTIR Software: siMPle microplastic IR spectral identification software
xh: Isoftware ye-FTIR yasimahla: i-siMPle microplastic IR spectral isoftware yokuchonga

en: Free Spectroscopy Learning Academy from ThermoFisher
xh: ISifundo seSifundo seSpectroscopy sasimahla esivela kwiThermoFisher

en: Free Optical Microscopy Learning Resource from Florida State University
xh: IsiXhobo sokuFunda seMikroskophu yasimahla kwiYunivesithi yaseFlorida State

en: Free desktop application for spectral analysis and links to reference databases.
xh: Isicelo sasimahla se-desktop sohlalutyo lwe-spectral kunye namakhonkco kwi-database yereferensi.

en:
If you like, we share your uploaded spectra and settings with the spectroscopy community.
           By default, all data will be licensed under Creative Commons Attribution-NonCommercial 4.0 International (CC BY-NC 4.0).
           Uploaded spectra will appear here: https://osf.io/rjg3c
xh:
Ukuba uyathanda, sabelana ngembonakalo yakho elayishiweyo kunye nesetingi kunye noluntu lwespectroscopy.
           Ngokungagqibekanga, yonke idatha iya kunikwa ilayisenisi phantsi kwe-Creative Commons Attribution-Non Commercial 4.0 International (CC BY-NC 4.0).
           Umboniso olayishiweyo uya kuvela apha: https://osf.io/rjg3c

en:
Upload Raman or FTIR spectrum files as a csv, jdx, spc, or spa. A csv file is preferred. If a csv, the file must contain one column labeled 'wavenumber' in units of (1/cm) and another column labeled 'intensity' in absorbance units.
            If jdx, spc, spa, or 0 the file should be a single absorbance spectrum with wavenumber in (1/cm). These files will not always work perfectly because they are tricky to read so double check them in another software.
            Hit the 'Test Data' button to download a sample Raman spectrum.
xh:
Layisha iifayile ze-Raman okanye ze-FTIR ze-spectrum njenge-csv, i-jdx, i-spc, okanye i-spa. Ifayile ye-csv iyakhethwa. Ukuba i-csv, ifayile kufuneka iqulathe ikholamu enye ebhalwe 'inombolo yamaza' kwiiyunithi ze (1/cm) kunye nomnye umhlathi obhalwe 'ubunzima' kwiiyunithi zokufunxa.
            Ukuba i-jdx, i-spc, i-spa, okanye i-0 ifayile kufuneka ibe yi-spectrum yokufunxa enye ene-wavenumber kwi (1/cm). Ezi fayile aziyi kuhlala zisebenza ngokugqibeleleyo kuba zikhohlisa ukufunda ukuze zijonge kabini kwenye isoftware.
            Cofa iqhosha elithi 'Idatha yoVavanyo' ukukhuphela isampulu yeRaman.

en:
If the uploaded spectrum is not in absorbance units, 
           use this input to specify the units to convert from.Open Specy can 
           adjust reflectance or transmittance spectra to Absorbance units using 
           this drop down in the upload file tab. All of the preceding tabs 
           assume that the data is in absorbance units so you should make the 
           correction before continuing if needed. The transmittance adjustment 
           uses the log10(1/T) calculation which does not correct for system 
           and particle characteristics. The reflectance adjustment uses the 
           Kubelka-Munk equation (1-R)2/(2*R). We assume that the reflectance 
           is formatted as a percent from 1-100 and first correct the intensity by dividing by 100
           so that it fits the form expected by the equation.
           If none is selected, Open Specy assumes that the uploaded data is 
           an absorbance spectrum.
xh:
Ukuba i-spectrum elayishiweyo ayikho kwiiyunithi zokufunxa,
           sebenzisa eli galelo ukukhankanya iiyunithi oza kuziguqula.Vula iSpecy can
           Lungisa i-reflection okanye i-spectra yokudlulisela kwiiyunithi ze-Absorbance usebenzisa
           oku kuwisa phantsi kwithebhu yefayile yokulayisha. Zonke iithebhu ezandulelayo
           cinga ukuba idatha ikwiiyunithi zokufunxa ngoko kufuneka wenze i
           ukulungiswa phambi kokuqhubeka ukuba kuyimfuneko. Ulungelelwaniso lokuhambisa
           isebenzisa ubalo lwelog10(1/T) olungalungiyo kwisixokelelwano
           kunye neempawu zamasuntswana. Ulungelelwaniso lokubonakalisa lusebenzisa i
           I-Kubelka-Munk equation (1-R) 2 / (2 * R). Sicinga ukuba ukubonakaliswa
           ifomathwa njengepesenti ukusuka ku-1 ukuya kwe-100 kwaye kuqala ulungise ubunzulu ngokwahlula-hlula nge-100.
           ukuze ilingane ngendlela elindelwe yinxaki.
           Ukuba akukho nanye ekhethiweyo, Vula iSpecy ithatha ukuba idatha elayishiweyo
           i-absorbeance spectrum.

en: This is a sample spectrum that can be uploaded to the tool for testing it out and understanding how the csv files should be formatted.
xh: Le yisampuli yespectrum enokufakwa kwisixhobo sokuyivavanya kunye nokuqonda ukuba iifayile ze-csv kufuneka zifomathwe njani.

en:
We share any uploaded spectra and metadata with the spectroscopy community if you fill out the metadata here and select share.
           Uploaded spectra and metadata will appear here: https://osf.io/rjg3c
xh:
Sabelana ngayo nayiphi na imbonakalo elayishiweyo kunye nemetadata kunye noluntu lwe-spectroscopy ukuba ugcwalisa imethadatha apha kwaye ukhethe ukwabelana.
           Imbonakalo elayishiweyo kunye nemetadata iya kuvela apha: https://osf.io/rjg3c

en: Upload some data to get started...
Smooth, Baseline Correct, and Download Processed Spectra
xh: Igudile, iBaseline ichanekile, kwaye Khuphela iSpectra eQhutyiweyo

en: Some users may wish to save a copy of their processed spectrum. This button downloads the processed spectrum as a csv file.
xh: Abanye abasebenzisi banokunqwenela ukugcina ikopi yesspectrum esetyenzisiweyo. Eli qhosha likhuphela umboniso oqhutyelweyo njengefayile ye-csv.

en: This smoother can enhance the signal to noise ratio of the data and uses a Savitzky-Golay filter with 12 running data points and the polynomial specified.
xh: Oku kugudileyo kunokunyusa umlinganiselo wesignali kwingxolo yedatha kwaye isebenzisa i-Savitzky-Golay filter kunye ne-12 eqhuba amanqaku edatha kunye ne-polynomial echazwe.

en: This baseline correction routine has two options for baseline correction, 1) the polynomial imodpolyfit procedure to itteratively find the baseline of the spectrum using a polynomial fit to the entire region of the spectra. 2) manual lines can be drawn using the line tool on the plot and the correct button will use the lines to subtract the baseline.
xh: Le ndlela yokulungiswa kwesiseko ineendlela ezimbini zokulungiswa kwesiseko, i-1) inkqubo ye-polynomial imodpolyfit yokufumana ngokukhawuleza isiseko se-spectrum usebenzisa i-polynomial fit kuwo wonke ummandla we-spectra. I-2) imigca yezandla inokutsalwa ngokusebenzisa isixhobo somgca kwisicwangciso kwaye iqhosha elichanekileyo liya kusebenzisa imigca ukukhupha isiseko.

en: Restricting the spectral range can remove regions of spectrum where no peaks exist and improve matching
xh: Ukunciphisa uluhlu lwe-spectral kunokususa imimandla ye-spectrum apho kungekho zincopho zikhoyo kwaye kuphuculwe ukuhambelana

en: Identify Spectrum Using the Reference Library
xh: Chonga iSpectrum usebenzisa iThala leeNcwadi loLwazi

en: This selection will determine whether the FTIR or Raman matching library is used. Choose the spectrum type that was uploaded.
xh: Olu khetho luya kuqinisekisa ukuba i-FTIR okanye ilayibrari ethelekisekayo yeRaman iyasetyenziswa. Khetha uhlobo lwesspectrum olulayishiweyo.

en: This selection will determine whether the uploaded (not processed) spectrum or the spectrum processed using the processing tab is used in the spectrum match.
xh: Olu khetho luya kugqiba ukuba ngaba i-spectrum elayishiweyo (engaqhutyelwanga) okanye i-spectrum esetyenzisiweyo kusetyenziswa ithebhu yokucubungula isetyenziswe kumdlalo we-spectrum.

en: This selection will determine whether the library you are matching to consists of the full spectrum or only spectrum peaks.
xh: Olu khetho luya kugqiba ukuba ithala leencwadi olidibanisayo liqulathe i-spectrum epheleleyo okanye kuphela iincopho ze-spectrum.

en: Help us reach our goal of revolutionizing spectroscopy.
xh: Sincede sifikelele kwinjongo yethu yokuguqula i-spectroscopy.

en: A paid team that is pushing Open Specy closer to the ultimate goal of 100% accurate spectral identification and deep spectral diagnostics with a single click
xh: Iqela elihlawulweyo elityhala i-Open Specy kufutshane neyona njongo iphambili ye-100% echanekileyo yokuchongwa kwembonakalo kunye noxilongo olunzulu lwe-spectral ngokuchofoza kanye.

en: A single paid staff person working to update and build the community and the tool
xh: Umntu omnye ohlawulelwayo osebenzayo ukuhlaziya nokwakha uluntu kunye nesixhobo

en: Maintenance costs and minor ad-hoc updates and bug fixes
xh: Iindleko zokulungisa kunye nohlaziyo oluncinci lwe-ad-hoc kunye nokulungiswa kwebug

en: Keeping the app online and essential maintenance
xh: Ukugcina i-app kwi-intanethi kunye nokugcinwa okuyimfuneko

en: Thank you for sharing your data!
Your data will soon be available at https://osf.io/stmv4/
xh: Idatha yakho iza kufumaneka kungekudala https://osf.io/stmv4/

en:
Uploaded data type is not currently supported; please
                      check tooltips and 'About' tab for details.
xh:
Uhlobo lwedatha elayishiweyo ayixhaswa okwangoku; ndiyacela
                      khangela iingcebiso zesixhobo kunye nesithuba 'Malunga' ngeenkcukacha.

en:
If you uploaded a text/csv file, make sure that the 
           columns are numeric and named 'wavenumber' and 
           'intensity'.
xh:
Ukuba ulayishe umbhalo/ifayile ye-csv, qiniseka ukuba i
           Imihlathi inamanani kwaye ibizwa ngokuba 'inani lamaza' kunye
           'ubukhulu'.
